Class Player

java.lang.Object
ZombiesGame.model.Entity
ZombiesGame.model.Player
public class Player extends Entity
Player class that inherits from Entity has all basic methods and fields (position, velocity, etc.)

    • collidesWith

      public boolean collidesWith​(Entity e)
      checks for whether collision occurs between this entity and entity 'e', assuming they are not the same reference
      Specified by:
      collidesWith in class Entity
      Parameters:
      e - given entity e that may collide with this entity
      Returns:
      true if hitboxes intersect and entity 'e' is an enemy or an item, otherwise false
